column4:
['Piddly si baatein kyun karti ho sharma ke', '
Piddly si baatein', '
Piddly iraade main sach karun aate jaate', '
Piddly iraade', 'Pagla hoon yaar ya pagla hai pyaar', '
Aise chalta hai ye karobaar', '
Pyaar ke saaye mein sab piddly hain yahaan', '
Piddly si baatein kyun karti ho sharma ke', '
Piddly si baatein', '
Piddly iraade main sach karun aate jaate', '
Piddly iraade', '
Waade muraadein yeah hey…', 'Khili khili soorat teri', '
Uske aage sab hain piddly piddly', '
Mili mili aisi khushi', '
Iske aage sab hain piddly piddly', 'Lab ki lifaafon mein jo likhi hain marziyaan', '
Chhup ke se sun’ne mein hi hai mazaa', '
Lafzon ke kabjon mein jo chupi hain chaahatein', '
Aankhon se padhne mein hi hai nasha', '
Nashe ke saaye mein sab piddly hain yahaan', 'Piddly si baatein kyun karti ho sharma ke', '
Piddly si baatein', '
Piddly iraade main sach karun aate jaate', '
Piddly iraade', '
Waade muraadein yeah hey…', 'Na na na teri na na', '
Uske aage saare haan piddly piddly', '
Haa na yaa na zara yaa naa', '
Tu jo hai toh sapne piddly piddly', '
Socha hai maine woh jo sochogi tum kabhi', '
Socho se aage jaane mein hai mazaa', '
Khwaabo se aage jo bhi dekhogi khwaab tum', '
Khwaabo se aage chalne mein hai nasha', '
Nashe ke saaye mein sab piddly hain yahaan', 'Piddly si baatein kyun karti ho sharma ke', '
Piddly si baatein', '
Piddly iraade main sach karun aate jaate', '
Piddly iraade', 'Pagla hoon yaar ya pagla hai pyaar', '
Aise chalta hai ye karobaar', '
Pyaar ke saaye mein sab piddly hain yahaan', '
Piddly si baatein kyun karti ho sharma ke', '
Piddly si baatein', '
Piddly iraade main sach karun aate jaate', '
Piddly iraade', '
Waade muraadein yeah hey…']
